verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Rising, He justified freely forever:
One day He’s coming –
oh, glorious day!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
One day when heaven was filled with His praises,
One day when sin
was as black as could be…

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Jesus came forth to be born
of a virgin
Dwelt amongst men,
my example is He!…

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
One day they led Him up
Calvary’s mountain,
One day they nailed Him
to die on the tree;
Suffering anguish,
despised and rejected:
Bearing our sins,
my Redeemer is He!….

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
One day they left Him alone
in the garden,
One day He rested,
from suffering free;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Angels came down o‘er
His tomb to keep vigil;
Hope of the hopeless,
my Savior is He!..

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
One day the grave could conceal Him no longer,
One day the stone rolled away from the door;

verse.name: v4b
v5a
v5b
verse.lines:
Wonderful day,
my beloved ones bringing;
Glorious Savior,
this Jesus is mine!
